data.name: ZYLIA Concert Hall
data.description:
The Walk Through The Music with Poznań Philharmonic Orchestra

34 musicians and a world-class Conductor recorded live in the concert hall with ZYLIA 6 DoF Navigable Audio system. Walkthrough the stage and stand next to any artist. Download the 360-degrees demo for VR goggles and take this immersive journey home where you smoothly navigate through the scene and experience the sound from anyplace – close perspective, the backstage, or the audience. Notice how the sound changes while passing by the musicians.

Comments:
“The border between the musician and audience was existing for ages. Once you pass this border you are entering a real musical world. This kind of experience is an experience I cannot describe. You have to fill it."

Recordings: Poznań Philharmonic Orchestra conducted by Łukasz Borowicz (Principal Guest Conductor Poznań Philharmonic Orchestra).

Music: W. A. Mozart - "The Marriage of Figaro", the overture
